articles.title: Moore secures third international jockeys' crown at Happy Valley
articles.summary: Ryan Moore showed he is right back at the top of his game in winning the Longines International Jockeys’ Championship for the third time at Happy Valley in Hong Kong.

articles.title: Could Pulev earn WBA 'super' title fight against Usyk?
articles.summary: Kubrat Pulev would "definitely be interested" in a future fight with WBA 'super' champion Oleksandr Usyk.

articles.title: F1 2026 car and livery launches schedule
articles.summary: Formula 1 is poised to begin a new era of much-changed cars and engines in 2026, making 'launch season' one of the most eagerly-anticipated in years.

articles.title: Littler, Maddison and Big John star in hilarious 'Club 180' sketch
articles.summary: Walk-on if you love the darts: James Maddison, Luke Littler and Big John star as ‘Club 180’ opens ahead of the 2026 PDC World Darts Championship.

articles.title: Ashes nightmare continues as Aussie radio station troll England on beach!
articles.summary: Australian radio station 92.7 Mix FM tracked down the England cricket team relaxing on the beach for some sledging, which was taken in good spirits by Ben Stokes!

articles.title: Shields to defend undisputed heavyweight crown against Crews-Dezurn
articles.summary: Claressa Shields will defend her undisputed heavyweight crown against Franchon Crews-Dezurn at Little Caesars Arena in Detroit early next year.

articles.title: Dubois targets Harper fight early in 2026
articles.summary: Caroline Dubois will pursue a showdown with British rival Terri Harper next year.

articles.title: Van Dijk quizzed over Salah future
articles.summary: Liverpool's Virgil van Dijk says he hopes the situation with Mohamed Salah and the club is resolved but admits he has no idea what the future holds for his team-mate.

articles.title: Sabalenka says women facing transgender athletes 'not fair'
articles.summary: Aryna Sabalenka weighed into the participation of transgender athletes, saying it would be unfair for women to face "biological men" in professional tennis.

articles.title: The Littler effect: How 'Littlermania' keeps pushing darts to new levels
articles.summary: The World Darts Championship is back bigger than ever, live on Sky Sports, with the rapid rise of Luke Littler helping to take interest and excitement in the sport to unprecedent levels.

articles.title: Moore, Doyle and Buick compete against world’s best for IJC title
articles.summary: Wednesday sees the world’s best flat jockeys gather in Hong Kong as they compete in the International Jockeys’ Championship, all live on Sky Sports Racing.

articles.title: Cummins back for third Ashes Test as Carey defends England over beach reset
articles.summary: Pat Cummins has officially returned to the Australia squad as captain after missing the last two games against England with back trouble as the hosts attempt to clinch a series win in Adelaide next we...

articles.title: F1 driver ratings: How do Norris, Verstappen, Hamilton and more rank for 2025?
articles.summary: So who starred and who struggled in a Formula 1 season that went down to the wire in 2025? Running through the grid in final Drivers' Championship order, see how the sport's stars rated for their perf...

articles.title: Zirkzee wants to stay at Man Utd amid Roma interest
articles.summary: Joshua Zirkzee wants to stay at Manchester United to fight for his place in the squad amid interest from Roma.

articles.title: Norris reveals wish for future battles against Hamilton
articles.summary: Lando Norris admits he would "love" to race more against Lewis Hamilton in the 2026 season, as F1's new world champion backed the sport's most successful driver to bounce back from his difficult year ...
